biography: Mikael, a celebrated name from Kurk Golf, is known for his dedication to the sport and his meticulous approach to the game. Although generally quiet, Mikael is always keen to share his knowledge of the sport with young players.

Mikael has participated once in the Hector Trophée. While he has not yet captured the coveted Hector Trophée or the individual Victor Trophy, his presence is always noted, and his performance closely watched.
Although Mikael is considered retired from the Hector Trophée, the door is always open for a comeback. His fans would be thrilled to see him compete again.
Whether or not he returns to the competitive arena, Mikael's contributions to golf, especially within his home club, remain significant and appreciated.
